name: TheMichiganManPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open The Michigan Man Podcast”
”Alexa, start The Michigan Man Podcast”
”Alexa, ask The Michigan Man Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the michigan man podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Michigan Man Podcast is produced for die hard Wolverine fans. The show will include weekly interviews with Michigan Bloggers and other special guests. The center piece of the show will be fan feedback. We want fans to phone in audio posts, and email their comments, rants...whatever is on their mind regarding Michigan athletics.

The Podcast format will evolve in the coming months. Initially we will have four segments. 

1) The View from section 17 - Commentary from host Mike Fitzpatrick

2) Weekly guest interviews.

3) Post game notes and scores focusing on Wolverine Football, Basketball, and hockey.

4) Fan Feedback - Audio posts from fans who want their opinion heard, or would like to comment on topics from earlier shows. 

Website:www.themichiganmanpodcast.com
email: themichiganmanpodcast@yahoo.com
Listener Line: 313 263-4842

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask The Michigan Man Podcast to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask The Michigan Man Podcast to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
